programme.title: Alaska's Ultimate Bush Pilots
programme.sub-title: Alaska's Ultimate Bush Pilots | Training Day
programme.desc: New pilots are put to the test to see if they have what it takes to fly for Island Air.

programme.title: Alaska's Ultimate Bush Pilots
programme.sub-title: Alaska's Ultimate Bush Pilots | Flying High
programme.desc: The Tanalian bush pilots transport extreme paragliders to Moose Creek, in the Talkeetna Range, for a once-in-a-lifetime airborne experience.

programme.title: Fight to Survive
programme.sub-title: Fight To Survive | Nightmare Canyon Pt. 2
programme.desc: Justin and Jeremy Harris' weekend descent into a remote Utah canyon becomes a survival nightmare when Justin severely breaks his leg. As night fast approaches and temperatures drop below freezing, how will these two brothers survive?

programme.title: Fight to Survive
programme.sub-title: Fight To Survive | Trapped in a Glacier
programme.desc: While hiking alone deep in Glacier National Park, Ted Porter plummets into an icy glacial crevasse.

programme.title: Captured: Extreme Weather
programme.desc: It's man versus nature in a race against time. Heart-pounding rescues captured on camera in these viral weather videos.

programme.title: Captured: Extreme Weather
programme.desc: Volcanic ash engulfing a town, a massive firenado in California - just some of the viral weather videos caught on camera in this episode of Captured, as Vicious Winds take center stage.

programme.title: Viral Wild
programme.desc: Between babbling brooks and lazy rivers lives nature's perfect calm.

programme.title: Viral Wild
programme.desc: No matter where you call home, these animals call it that too.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.desc: Following an intense hurricane season, Hurricane Michael is poised to hit Florida.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.desc: It’s an ordinary town with a history of heartache. No one knows why Moore, Oklahoma has been the target of 3 mega-tornadoes in just 16 years. On the heels of the May 20, 2013 EF5 tornado, Mark & Jaclyn uncover stories behind the disaster, the recovery and the tenacious spirit of the people of the US Midwest.

programme.title: Hellfire Heroes
programme.sub-title: Hellfire Heroes | Not If, But When
programme.desc: Firefighters and survivors share their stories; experts discuss the reality of wildfires.

programme.title: Viral Wild
programme.desc: Those that thrive beneath the waves teach us to go with the flow.

programme.title: Viral Wild
programme.desc: From oceans to rivers to kiddie pools, aquatic life finds a way.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.desc: The North Atlantic Ocean is generous with her bounty, until she takes a life in return. Mark braves the deep seas on the most dangerous day of the lobster fishing season.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.desc: One year after witnessing a record number of deadly twisters in Tornado Alley, Mark & Jaclyn return to the Midwest in search of more extreme storms. The hunt challenges their relationship with Mother Nature, as well as with each other.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.desc: Costa Rica is a tiny country jammed with diversity and adventure. George explores the volcanoes of Costa Rica with an international team of scientists, rafts down whitewater rivers in full flood, canyoneers down raging waterfalls, and handles some of deadliest snakes this tropical country has to offer.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.desc: George and three side-kicks head straight into the “Bearcage”, looking to get beat up by the biggest, baddest hailstones that Texas and Oklahoma can throw at them. They find it – and their stormchasing vehicles don’t look too pretty after coming through these massive storms.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.desc: George links up with two experienced polar adventurers to explore the frigid Canadian arctic in the depths of winter. The team first uses skis to cross the fractured sea ice of Frobisher Bay, then dog teams to head north through the spectacular Auyuittuq Mountains.
